summary: Defines the ONNX export configuration for the Blenderbot model, specifying its input and output tensors, handling past key/value caching, and providing utilities to create placeholder data for various NLP tasks such as language modeling, sequence-to-sequence translation, classification, and question answering.
business_intent: Enable seamless conversion of Blenderbot into an optimized ONNX runtime format for scalable, highâ€‘performance inference in production environments.
